.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 IndexOf(string str) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the index within this string of the first occurrence of the specified substring.
Docs.returns: if the string argument occurs as a substring within this object, then the index of the first character of the first such substring is returned; if it does not occur as a substring, -1 is returned.
